title: Microlearning Design for Strengthening Business Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and major-specific knowledge in business fields
context.additional_context: Online course for undergraduate science students to improve business information utilization skills, requiring student-centered design considering diverse learning types (commuter/remote/part-time)

learning_goals: Learners can retrieve specialized materials from business databases with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can evaluate reference materials in complex business reports within 72 hours to determine their reliability.
Learners can apply information literacy skills in team projects and pass peer evaluations at least twice out of three attempts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
